overview: Angie (April Olsen) and Ryan (Tee Reel) share an open marriage with their lover and roommate, Dawn (Paige Owen). Angie also enjoys an intimate relationship with their friend Aarons (Tommy Pistol) wife, Charlotte (Olivia Jay). Complicating this polyamorous arrangement, even more, Angie takes an interest in Aaron. Out of respect for each of their partners, they must first get the consent of everyone involved. If Angie and Aaron are to satisfy their desire for each other, there can be no room for jealousy.
title: No Room for Jealousy
